summary:
Offshore Safety Advisor.

Valid GMDSS Certificate, CAA - ROCC, CAA Offshore Meteorological Observations, Dangerous Goods by Air / by Sea, Authorised Gas Tester, CAS Assessor, Kelvin Top Set Investigator, STCW Safety Awareness, Liberian and Bahamian Seaman's Book, OGUK Medical and Shoulder Measurement, FOET and MIST certs (OPITO), as well as COSHH and CA-EBS.

Friendly, easygoing person with positive attitude. Communicative, always ready to help. Getting on very well with colleagues and supervisors alike. A trustworthy team player, capable of working without supervision when required. Can work under pressure, whilst maintaining a high standard of work in order to meet targets and deadlines.
Willing to undergo any additional training that may be required by a prospective employer.

During my time off, I love to read as much as I can, play music and visit art exhibitions.

I'm always eager to learn new things and continue with my training.
